name: Configuration
description: Validation of the feature flag enablement, and the toggle between Legacy and Redesign TicketTab UX

name: Upcoming Tab (Events View)
description:
Relevant JIRAs
*Beta Tickets Event List [BAT-73](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-73 ) / [BPA-7224](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7224 )
*Beta Tickets Event Card View [BAT-75](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-75 ) / [BPA-7220](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7220 )
*Beta Tickets "No upcoming events" CTA [BAT-82](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-82 )

name: Event Menu Options
description:
Menu accessed via '...' CTA on each Event Card

CTAs (list may not be exhaustive &not all options guaranteed) 
*View Tickets (TDC/TM clubs)
*Ticket Info (TDC/TM clubs)
*Share Tickets (TDC ONLY)
*Sell Tickets (TDC ONLY)
*Add To Wallet (TDC ONLY)


*[BAT-47](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BAT-47 ): Scan View - Share Tickets Action

name: Scanview (TDC ONLY)
description:
SCANVIEW CASES (ATM-SDK) [TDC ONLY]

Scanview CTAs
*Ticket Info - 'i' icon
*Add to Apple Wallet (if applicable)
*Sell Tickets
*Share Tickets

Note: TM clubs scanviews are shown w/in TMSDK
----------------------------
*Scanview can be navigated to via:
**'View Tickets' CTA from Event Card w/in Upcoming Event List
**'View Tickets' from Event Card Menu Option
**Event Card CTA > EventDetails Page 'Access Tickets' CTA
**'Ticket Info' from Event Card Menu Option > EventDetails Page 'Access Tickets' CTA
**'Share Tickets' from Event Card Menu Option

name: iOS
description:
*iOS CANNOT prevent screenshots. Taking a screenshot does NOT prevent it from being stored in the gallery.  
*iOS CAN detect screenshots and WILL notify the fan that screenshots will not work when entering the gate.

name: Android
description:
*Android notifies the fan when a screenshot is taken and prevent it from being stored in the local gallery. 
*Screenshot prevention is only enabled when there is a shared secret associated with a ticket.

Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image should be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

name: Ticket scanview OPEN QUESTIONS
description: [DETERMINE IF THE FOLLOWING BEHAVIORS/FEATURES ARE RELEVANT FOR REDESIGN - REMOVE, ONCE CONFIRMED]

name: Event Hub View
description:
CREATE EVENT DETAIL VIEW CASES

*requires ticket(s) on account

View accessed via Event Card CTA (also via Ticket Info menu option)

Event Details View coverage:
*ChatBot
*Event info (details/date/loc/logos)
*Ticket Acccess (TM and TDC)
*Stadium Info
*Weather
*Directions
